snp2.4:258: “Many devas and human beingshave reflected on blessings,longing for safety,so declare the highest blessing.” (1)
snp2.4:259: “Not associating with fools,associating with the wise,and venerating those worthy of veneration:this is the highest blessing. (2)
snp2.4:260: “Residing in a suitable place,merit done in the past,and directing oneself rightly:this is the highest blessing. (3) [47]
snp2.4:261: “Much learning, a craft,a well-trained discipline,and well-spoken speech:this is the highest blessing. (4)
snp2.4:262: “Serving one’s mother and father,maintaining a wife and children,and an honest occupation:this is the highest blessing. (5)
snp2.4:263: “Giving and righteous conduct,assistance to relatives,blameless deeds:this is the highest blessing. (6)
snp2.4:264: “Desisting and abstaining from evil,refraining from intoxicating drink,heedfulness in good qualities:this is the highest blessing. (7)
snp2.4:265: “Reverence and humility,contentment and gratitude,timely listening to the Dhamma:this is the highest blessing. (8)
snp2.4:266: “Patience, being amenable to advice,the seeing of ascetics,timely discussion on the Dhamma:this is the highest blessing. (9)
snp2.4:267: “Austerity and the spiritual life,seeing of the noble truths,and realization of nibbāna:this is the highest blessing. (10)
snp2.4:268: “One whose mind does not shakewhen touched by worldly conditions,sorrowless, dust-free, secure:this is the highest blessing. (11)
snp2.4:269: “Those who have done these thingsare victorious everywhere;everywhere they go safely:theirs is that highest blessing.” (12)
